application

Class HardwareManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.HardwareManager

  • public class HardwareManager
extends java.lang.Object

    HardwareManager

    Contains all functions and routines for the hardware. The hardware includes barcode readers, PIN code terminals, a barcode printer and an electronic lock.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Group 9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HardwareManager(java.util.Set<Customer> cList)
      Creates a class that manage all the hardware for the garage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HardwareManager

        public HardwareManager(java.util.Set<Customer> cList)
        Creates a class that manage all the hardware for the garage. The hardware includes barcode readers, PIN code terminals, a barcode printer and an electronic lock.
        Parameters:
        cList - A set of registered Customers for the garage

    • Method Detail

      • printBarcode

        public void printBarcode(java.lang.String barcode)
        Prints a barcode.
        Parameters:
        barcode - the barcode that shall be printed, barcode is 5 characters that can be 0-9
